I'm always a sucker for underdogs, especially when they're from my region. You guys are well presented and I hope your team goes far. The OPL is something new to the League of Legends community and hopefully you can make a great big mark in the beginning of this new era.

Good luck Trident Esports, and expect an instant icon buy the moment you guys start playing competitively against other teams in tournaments. So far I have yet to see your performances, but I shall support you now (from the start) to the end.

-Snax
